select block_id from blocks where banner_id='4' and block_id IN(1418,1419,1420,1421,1422,1423,1424,1425,1426,1427,1428,1518,1519,1520,1521,1522,1523,1524,1525,1526,1527,1528,1618,1619,1620,1621,1622,1623,1624,1625,1626,1627,1628,1718,1719,1720,1721,1722,1723,1724,1725,1726,1727,1728,1818,1819,1820,1821,1822,1823,1824,1825,1826,1827,1828)
